#summary Class to bind a certain constructor for use in the DummyCreator

= Introduction =

With the ConstructorBinder, a developer can specify, which Constructor of a certain Class should be used while object generation.

= Howto Use =

To bind a Constructor, you just have to use the following code:
{{{
    ConstructorBinder.bind(Class clazz, Constructor c);
}}}
To get the constructor, you normally would use reflection and then choose the
needed.
{{{
    Constructor[] constructors = clazz.getConstructors();
}}}
